duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic inspections on general truck-tractor systems utilizing both mechanical diagnostics and system software diagnostics.
Perform preventative maintenance inspection of truck-tractor components following a checklist.
Complete repairs to truck-tractor components including oil changes, light bulb replacement, brakes, electrical handling, and wheels and tires.
Provide superior customer service to all clients.
Make road calls when component failure is in a remote location.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED required.
